page.title: 03ALUM BAY GLASS
page.content:
In Alum Bay there is a shop that sells Alum Bay glass.They make hand- made glassware.They make paperweights and clocks.The most expensive thing is a claret jug.There are 10 colours:- There are pinks; blues; greens and browns.It takes 5 years to train.They sell their glass in their shop and they sell it abroad. The basic ingredients to make glass are sand, soda ash, limestone, potash and lead oxide.They melt them in a furnace and they form a glassy liquid.They have had a shop for fifteen years.
Helen Atree 8 years
Mrs P Telfer-Davey Headteacher
Mrs M Harrison Class Teacher
